title: Friends Circle — New England Complex Systems Institute

seo.description:
Joining the Friends circle for $20/month will give you a special 5% 
discounted registration for courses and conferences.

NECSI is a non-profit 501c(3) performing research to solve social problems, 
improve healthcare, and prevent violence. Donations are tax exempt.

Your generous contributions enable NECSI to find solutions to the world’s 
most pressing challenges.
